completeListOfAbilities.name: Double Fire
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
4-hit  PI magic  PG attack +  PF attack delivered 2 times
Increases BRV based on ATK before second delivery
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
Cancels Double Black Magic after use
